xuiUnitConversion
filter in module xui

Description

Filter used for formatting value of different units. Unit suffix is automatically added based on value. Units that are supported: bytes, bits per second, hertz.

Usage

In HTML Template Binding

{{ xuiUnitConversion_expression | xuiUnitConversion:precision:plusSign:unit }}

In JavaScript

$filter('xuiUnitConversion')(value, precision, plusSign, unit)

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
valuestring

The source value.

precisionnumber

Precision of formatted value. Extra trailing zeros are removed independently of the precision.

plusSignstring

If true and source value is positive, plus sign prefix is added.

unitUnitOption

type of unit: bytes, bits per second or hertz. Effects scale and unit shortcut value in the function output.
